name: Cute animal jigsaw puzzle
description:
The puzzles shouldn't be complex, they should be fun!
Relax and have fun making beautiful images of cute animals.
Made for all ages.
20 different images.
4 difficulty levels containing 12, 20, 30 and 56 pieces.
Unlock each new puzzle after finishing the current one.
Gallery with unlockable images.
  • Relaxing music.
  • Button to change the background color.
  • Button to shuffle parts.
  • Button to view the complete image.
  • Automatic saving.
  • Steam achievements.
